summary: A team of researchers travel into the African jungle to study the mysterious disappearance of elephants in the area. Instead they discover a tribe of voodoo-zombies who rise from the ground... See full summary »
cast: Simón Andreu|Kali Hansa|María Kosty|Loreta Tovar|José Thelman|Bárbara Rey|Jack Taylor
title: La noche de los brujos
